text: A post shared on Instagram allegedly shows a screenshot of an alleged tweet from pharmaceutical company Pfizer saying all of its COVID-19 vaccines were placebos.
A video shared on Instagram purportedly shows the COVID-19 vaccine under a microscope.
A post shared on Facebook claims images of the first person in the U.K. to receive the Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine outside a clinical trial were published by CNN in October.
